Name: Triangular Level and Plumb Bob
Description: This wooden triangle is part of the construction equipment that was used to ensure that all walls were smooth and perfectly aligned. The tool consists of three pieces: two of them were fixed together to form a right angle, while the third small piece serves as a crossbar. A limestone bob is suspended by a cord from the apex of the right angle. Placed against a perfectly flat wall, the string of the bob would fall between the two lines indicated on the crossbar.
